basePositive: masterpiece, best quality, highly detailed, sharp focus
baseNegative: worst quality, low quality, blurry, watermark, text, signature, jpeg artifacts, deformed

sprite.positive: game sprite, transparent background, centered, clean edges, isolated character

ui_icon.positive: flat icon, minimal, centered symbol, clean vector style

logo.positive: logo design, bold typography, clean geometry, brand identity

texture.positive: seamless tileable texture, uniform lighting, no borders

tile.positive: seamless tileable pattern, uniform, repeating design

overlay.positive: transparent overlay, VFX element, clean alpha edges

spritesheet.positive: game spritesheet, multiple frames, consistent character, uniform spacing, transparent background
spritesheet.negative: single image, background clutter, overlapping frames

notes: Default profile for Copax TimeLess SDXL. Optimized for game-art and 2D asset generation.
